content: लुट् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (लोटते) {@--1@} To resist, repel, oppose. {@--2@} To shine. {@--3@} To suffer pain. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (लोटयति-ते) {@--1@} To speak. {@--2@} To shine. {vIII.v} {c1c} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (लोटति, लुट्यति) {@--1@} To roll, wallow on the ground; <ab>cf.</ab> लुठ्. {@--2@} To take away, rob, plunder (perhaps for लुंठ् or लुंट्).
लुट् A technical term used by Pāṇini to denote the First or Periphrastic Future or its terminations.
